CustomField.formula: CASE ( TEXT(Current_Specific_Status__c) , "Closed - By FLI" ,"Toilet closure initiated by FLI/Sanergy. It should remain in this status only for 90 days otherwise an alert should be sent to AMs and SOps Manager", "Closed - By FLO", "Short term toilet closure (<90 days) initiated by FLO", "Closed by FLO", "Toilet closure initiated by FLO", "Closed - Debranded","FLO has completed toilet payments but is not willing to renew", "Closed - Demolished","Toilet demolished by a third party other than FLI/Sanergy", "Closed - Relocated","If a Toilet is removed from a location, physically taken to a new location", "Closed - Repossessed","FLI repossessed structure, squat plate and waste containers when the FLO defaults in payments", "Closed by FLI","Toilet closure initiated by FLI", "Closed - Resold","Applies to all FLTs that have been sold to a different FLO", "Open - Company-Owned","FLT Owned by FLI after FLO has defaulted and it is a viable location", "Open - New","Newly launched operational FLT", "Open - Re-installed","Refers to FLT installed after a demolition and the FLO gets an alternative land or location within same area or different area", "Open - Re-opened","FLT Re-opened", "Open - Relocated","Same FLO relocating FLT within same or different area of operation. The same Location ID maintained OR Same FLO relocating FLT to another location and acquiring a NEW FLT tag.", "Open - Resold","FLT resold to another FLO", "Unknown Status")
CustomField.label: Operational Status Description
